reviews.review: The payoff of the last 10 years of  the MCU comes in 2 slices of cake, the first slice is the best tasting, most satisfying cake you'll ever have and you want to bite into the remaining one right away.
I hated this movie. it was depressing
Cannot wait for this movie. All the negative comments just say it took too long for Thanos to become a villain, well that's the point it was supposed to be built up to this exact moment. Duh!
What a movie! Hands down the best marvel movie ever!

One of the most ambitious comic-book movies ever. Ten years in the making has resulted in a movie full of epic scope, thrilling action, witty banter and genuine emotion. At the center, directors The Russo Brothers, impressively juggle a large array of characters and make it all work effectively. The movie is also full of spectacle, which the Russos stage with a grounded and visceral quality. It's also not without its flaws though, sometimes there is too much spectacle occurring at once. That being said, the Russos always keep the focus intimately on the characters and provide genuine stakes. Thanks to the villain Thanos, which Brolin performs in an impressive and standout matter, ranking as one the best baddies the MCU has had on-screen. He injects the character with a complex pathology, which makes him more interesting than your standard villain. Overall, The Russos, cast, and writers have whipped up a movie full of heart, laughs, action and well-paced entertainment. One of the best movies of the MCU.
10 years, 18 films...it's all led to this...and it PAID. OFF.

Damn Marvel...You pulled it off!!! I went through the entire emotional spectrum in a matter of close to 3 hours and left the theater with my jaw wide open in shock and excited and perplexed as where this will go now
5 out of 5 stars it totally lives up to the wait of 6 years since the credits of the first avengers movie. This is another win for marvel

It's a packed movie, but given the Herculean task of putting together the Marvel universe into one film AND balancing screentime AND providing a worthy foe, I can't imagine anyone doing it better!  But no, you can't just waltz in with zero knowledge of the MCU and expect to know what's going on.  And if you haven't watched the other Marvel movies, gotta get on that!
